required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: PREMOM II: Pregnancy Remote Monitoring of Women With Gestational Hypertensive Disorders
clinical_study.official_title: PREMOM II: Pregnancy Remote Monitoring of Women With Gestational Hypertensive Disorders

brief_summary.textblock: The goal of this project is thoroughly evaluate the added value of telemonitoring (TM) program for women at risk for gestational hypertensive disorders (GHD), by investigating it impact on prenatal follow-up, health outcomes for mother and child, costs and satisfaction, and by specifically investigating what are the major contributors to this added value.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Throug study completion, from the first contact with the gynaecologist (after fertilization) untill 34 weeks of gestation.

Numbers of hospitalization during pregnancy (Numeric. Available by hospital details of every patient who is included in the study. From the moment of hospitalization until the moment of discharge is 1 hospitalization.
primary_outcome.description: Through study completion, from 32 weeks of gestation untill 34 weeks of gestation.

secondary_outcome.measure: number of prenatal consults
secondary_outcome.description: prenatal follow- up, numeric value, every consult during pregnancy from the first consultation until delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of ultrasounds
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, every ultrasound during pregnancy from the first consultation until delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of CTG's
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, every CTG during pregnancy from the first consultation until delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of hospitalizations of the mother at the MIC department
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, every hospitalization at the MIC during pregnancy from the first consultation until delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of days admitted to the MIC
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, amount of days admitted to the MIC from the first consultation unitil delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of medication adaptations during pregnancy
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, every change from no medication intake/a specific medciation at a specific dose to another medication intake at a specific dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: development of gestational hypertensive disorders
secondary_outcome.description: numeric, the diagnoses of gestational hypertension/pre-eclampsia/HELLP during pregnancy

secondary_outcome.measure: Onset of delivery
secondary_outcome.description: categorical (spontaneous, induced, primary section)

secondary_outcome.measure: Onset of delivery
secondary_outcome.description: categorical (spontaneous, induced, primary section) from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Mode of delivery
secondary_outcome.description: categorical (vaginal, instrumental, primary/secondary section) from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Birthweight
secondary_outcome.description: gram from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Apgar at 1' and 5'
secondary_outcome.description: numeric (0-10) from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Admission to the neonatal intensive care (NIC)
secondary_outcome.description: categorical(Yes/no) from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of days admitted to the NIC
secondary_outcome.description: numeric value, amount of days admidtted to the NIC, from birth until discharge from the hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: Cost for the health care services (HCS)
secondary_outcome.description: Costs of the prenatal care as described in Secondary outcomes (1) and costs for the care during and after the delivery as described in Secondary outcomes (2), which are divided in: costs for the HCS, costs for the patient, costs for the RIZIV. All costs will be collected in Euros. rom the first contact with the gynaecologist until the discharge from the hospital of both the mother and the neonate.

secondary_outcome.measure: number of phone calls from the patient to the midwife for technical issues
secondary_outcome.description: numeric scale, contributor to the added value of TM

secondary_outcome.measure: number of phone calls from the patient to the midwife for medical issues
secondary_outcome.description: numeric scale, contributor to the added value of TM

secondary_outcome.measure: number of phone calls from the midwife to the patient for technical issues
secondary_outcome.description: numeric scale, contributor to the added value of TM from the inclusion in the study until the moment of delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of phone calls from the midwife to the patient for medical issues
secondary_outcome.description: numeric scale, contributor to the added value of TM from the inclusion in the study until the moment of delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: number of starts/adjustments to the antihypertensive medication
secondary_outcome.description: numeric scale, contributor to the added value of TM from the inclusion in the study until the moment of delivery

intervention.description: Women who are allocated to the PSM groep, will receive a connected blood pressure monitor. They have to measure their blood pressure twice a day and fill in their weight once a week in the App. These data are automatically transmitted via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi to the hospital, but the caregiver will not see those data, and can not react to it.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- a risk > 1/100 on the Fetal Medicine Foundation (FMF) tool, which is used from the following website: https://fetalmedicine.org/research/assess/preeclampsia/first-trimester
Exclusion Criteria:
- congenital malformations of the newborn,
- pregnant women who doesn't have a Smartphone,
- pregnant women < 18 years old,
- pregnant women who doesn't understand the Dutch/French/English language. -
